description: An authenticated sensitive information disclosure vulnerability exists in the CLI service accessed via the PAPI protocol. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability results in the ability to read arbitrary files in the underlying operating system.

product.name: Aruba InstantOS and Aruba Access Points running ArubaOS 10

enisaIdProduct.product_version: InstantOS or ArubaOS (access points) 8.10.x.x: 8.10.0.10 and below.
